name: Ambitions
overview: A multigenerational family saga centered around one woman who, having recently relocated and intent on revitalizing her marriage, finds herself going head to head with some of the most powerful and deceitful players in the city.

episodes.name: Friends & Lovers
episodes.overview: A woman moves to a new city and finds herself going head to head with some of the town's most powerful and deceitful players.

episodes.name: Woman To Woman
episodes.overview: Amara puts Stephanie on notice; Atlanta’s First Lady learns a shocking secret from a rival’s past; Bella makes a bold play to get what she wants; and Rondell meets an intriguing ally in her fight to save her restaurant.

episodes.name: Welcome to Birmingham
episodes.overview: Stephanie continues her quest to repay Amara; Rondell falls out of favor with Senior, and Bella develops a new strategy.

episodes.name: Reap What You Sew
episodes.overview: Stephanie and Evan join forces for their own self-interest while Titus embarks on a mission that could jeopardize his entire career.

episodes.name: Killing Me Softly
episodes.overview: A newcomer to Atlanta carries out a nefarious plan; Stephanie deals from the bottom of the deck to get what she wants.

episodes.name: What About Your Friends
episodes.overview: Stephanie is a force to be reckoned with at a Women's Empowerment Summit; Bella forges an alliance with Rod.

episodes.name: Poison Wine
episodes.overview: Stephanie makes an accusation and vows to get revenge; Bella navigates Rod and Evan; Amara forms an unlikely partnership that compels Titus to make questionable moves; Senior suffers a health setback; Carly takes a leap of faith with Lori.

episodes.name: Backstabbers
episodes.overview: Stephanie and Irene conspire against Rondell; Titus takes matters into his own hands.

episodes.name: Giving Up
episodes.overview: Stephanie finds a way to put her enemies at bay. The highly anticipated Anniversary Celebration at Thelma's Place ends sooner than expected.

episodes.name: Ex-Factor
episodes.overview: The Barnes have a big surprise for the Carlisles, forcing Stephanie and Evan to fight fire with fire; Amara receives backlash at work for her prior indiscretions.

episodes.name: The Thrill Is Gone
episodes.overview: Evan and Rondell demand justice from Greg; Titus and Amara work to reconcile; Stephanie pushes back against Greg's cousin Natasha.

episodes.name: Since I Lost My Baby
episodes.overview: Stephanie closes in on Evan, Hunter, and Titus; Evan and Rondell are greeted with a blast from their past; Evan and Bella endure the worst nightmare of their lives.

episodes.name: You Owe Me
episodes.overview: Amara sets a trap; Stephanie gathers new evidence.

episodes.name: Blood on the Dance Floor
episodes.overview: Stephanie issues an ultimatum; Evan betrays an ally; Amara baits a witness; Damian takes a stand.

episodes.name: Hit 'em Up
episodes.overview: Rondell and Evan join forces to save Thelma's Place; an unlikely suspect comes forth as Senior's killer; Amara is taken off guard; Stephen and Hunter release their fury; Perla gets revenge
